Attending Distill

Distill will take place at the Palace of Fine Arts where you will experience stellar content in an inspirational and iconic setting. In addition, there will be ample opportunity to hang out with your fellow attendees amidst specialty coffee, local delicacies, libations, games and more. Shuttles will transport you to and from the venue daily and there will be great wifi for you to stay connected and responsive throughout the conference.


Take a look back at Distill 2013

Venue

Distill will be hosted at the Palace of Fine Arts Exhibit Hall.

Breakfast, lunch and refreshments will be provided throughout the conference.

Palace of Fine Arts
3301 Lyon Street
San Francisco, CA 94123
USA

Click here for directions to the Palace of Fine Arts from the Parc 55

Hotel

The Parc 55 is the hotel of choice for Distill. We have negotiated a special rate of $219/night for attendees, which includes wifi. To reserve your room click here or contact reservations at 415-392-8000 and let them know that you are part of the "Distill 2014 Engine Yard" room block.

Parc 55 Wyndham
55 Cyril Magnin Street
San Francisco, CA 94102

Transportation

Shuttles will transport you to and from the venue daily and to the kickoff party on the first night of the conference. The shuttle schedule will be posted shortly.
